Statute.Title: Department of Housing, Infrastructure and Communities Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Ministère du Logement, de l’Infrastructure et des Collectivités, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of the Infrastructure and Communities (see s. 3)

CIF.Text: CIF 2024, c. 15, s. 323 (ss. 1 to 12) in force on assent 20.06.2024
